preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from patient_identifier_type where format like '%CHK%';

changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value = (select name from concept_name where name = 'Death Reason' and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'fr' and voided = 0), date_changed = now(), changed_by = 1 where property = 'concept.reasonForDeath';
